prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with multiple heads and dark scales.
Imagine a dark and dragon-like creature soaring through the night sky.
Design a Pokemon that embodies strength and cunning with menacing features.
Show me a three-headed dragon Pokemon with striking blue accents.
Make a fearsome dragon that thrives in mountainous habitats.
Generate a mythical creature with sharp claws and fierce eyes.
Give me a legendary dragon Pokemon that commands the skies.
